info.name: Krautchan - Custom Country Balls
info.description:
Changes some of the country balls.

Gives them hats and other items. 

<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3

Special thanks to everyone who made the custom balls and to everyone who dumped them!

<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3


*************************************
Tested on Mozilla Firefox, Chrome/Chromium and Opera!
info.additionalInfo:
Version 0.6
- Blinkenworld support

Version 0.5
- Added Belgium, Argentina, Italy, Slovakia, Slovenia, Ireland, Eesti, Bulgaria, Denmark, Czech Republic, Switzerland
- Many soldier balls for different countries. 
- Austria-Hungary for Austria & Hungary
- Ottoman for Turkey
- Cetnik for Serbia

Version 0.4
- Added Bosnia, Sweden, Norway, Hungary, Chile
- More options for Poland, Austria, Netherlands

Version 0.3
- Added Serbia, Croatia, Turkey, Australia, Mexico, Austria, Finland, UK, Brazil 
- More options for Rushka
- More options for France

Version 0.2
- Added Poland, Germany, Romania, France, Venezuela, Canada, Netherlands and USA

Version 0.1

- Only Russia custom balls available.
